title: Broadcasting rights revenue of European soccer leagues 2017/2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million euros for 15 number of Countrys.
The Revenue in million euros is highest at Country England and lowest at Country Austria.
The difference of Revenue in million euros between the highest and lowest Country is 3188.0.
